mapper.select: SELECT SYS_USER.USER_ID, SYS_USER.LOGIN_NAME, SYS_USER.LOGIN_PWD, SYS_USER.USER_NAME, SYS_USER.STATUS, SYS_USER.LAST_LOGIN_TIME, SYS_USER.LAST_LOGIN_IP, SYS_USER.CREATE_TIME, SYS_USER.EMAIL, SYS_USER.TEL, SYS_USER.ROLE_ID FROM SYS_USER WHERE SYS_USER.STATUS!=2 ORDER BY SYS_USER.USER_ID
